Statistic: SELECT * FROM statistic WHERE id LIKE '%{organism_name}%'
Taxonomy: SELECT * FROM taxonomy WHERE organism_name LIKE '%{organism_name}%'
Location: SELECT * FROM location WHERE id LIKE '%{organism_name}%'
Gene: SELECT * FROM genes WHERE id LIKE '%{organism_name}%'
All: SELECT * FROM general_info WHERE id LIKE '%{organism_name}%'
